task: Implement and scaffold the Tasks frontend UI in codex-rs by creating the needed files and code changes.

plannerResult.raw_task: Implement and scaffold the Tasks frontend UI in codex-rs by creating the needed files and code changes.

subtasks.name: agent-router
subtasks.objective: Integrate a new Tasks route/screen into app entry flow, including view dispatch, keyboard/workspace entrypoint wiring, and any existing route/state enums required for navigation.

subtasks.name: agent-state
subtasks.objective: Define/extend task-domain UI state and reducers: async fetch lifecycle, selected task state, pagination/filter placeholders, and state transitions consumed by the new screen.

subtasks.name: agent-ui
subtasks.objective: Create the Tasks frontend scaffolding (list/detail/error/loading/empty views), row rendering helpers, and interaction wiring (selection movement, mark/dismiss actions hooks) that consume the state layer.

subtasks.name: agent-snapshots
subtasks.objective: Add/adjust render-focused tests or snapshot coverage for the new Tasks views and wire any required fixture data for deterministic task UI output.
